channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Linux期末大作业
item.description: 安装并配置Git 1.下载Git sudo apt-get install git 2.配置用户名和邮箱 git config --global user.name "L-Y2533" git config --global user.email "1835811157@qq.com" git config --list 3.配置Git的私钥和公钥 ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "1835811157@qq.com" 4.查看私钥 cat ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub 5.建立连接 将私钥粘贴到Git上建立连接 6.验证连接 ssh -T git@github.com 7.在GitHub上创建远程仓库 创建远程镜像 8.连接远程仓库 echo "# Linux" >> README.md git init git add README.md git commit -m "first commit" git branch -M main git remote add origin git@github.com:L-Y2533/Linux.git git push -u origin main 安装Docker 1.更新现有的包列表 sudo apt-get install update 2.
